column1: $V Angelus Dominī nuntiāvit Marīae. ^ The Angel of the Lord declared unto Mary.
$R Et concepit dē Spīritū Sanctō. ^ And she conceived of the Holy Spirit.

column3: Jēsūs. ^ blessed art thou amongst women
column4: and blessed is the fruit of thy womb
et in hōrā mortis nostrae. Āmen. ^ Holy Mary
column6: pray for us sinners now and at the hour of our death. Amen.

column1: $V Ecce ancilla Dominī. ^ Behold the handmaid of the Lord.
$R Fiat mihi secundum verbum tuum. ^ Be it done unto me according to thy word.

column3: Jēsūs. ^ blessed art thou amongst women
column4: and blessed is the fruit of thy womb
et in hōrā mortis nostrae. Āmen. ^ Holy Mary
column6: pray for us sinners now and at the hour of our death. Amen.

column1: $R Ut dignī efficiāmur prōmissiōnibus Chrīstī. ^ That we may be made worthy of the promises of Christ.

column7: per passiōnem ejus et crucem ad resurrēctiōnis glōriam perdūcāmur. Per eumdem Chrīstum Dominum nostrum. Āmen. ^ Let us pray. Pour forth
column11: that we to whom the Incarnation of Christ thy Son was made known by the message of an angel
column12: may by his Passion and Cross be brought to the glory of his resurrection. Through the same Christ our Lord. Amen.
